quotes.quote: Take my credit card to the hedge fund! I’ll meet you at the martini store!
quotes.author: Jason

quotes.quote: It's like, who died and left Aristotle in charge of ethics?
quotes.author: Eleanor

quotes.quote: I am in paradise! I should be doing paradise things, like rowing out on a lake with a good bottle of wine, reading French poetry.
quotes.author: Chidi

quotes.quote: Want some pizza? Bad Place crew delivered a hundred of these to my office. All Hawaiian, the worst pizza.
quotes.author: Michael

quotes.quote: Attention Eleanor Shellstrop and Jason Mendoza. This is the Almighty Judge on High of All Beings Living and Dead for All Eternity. My name is Shawn.
quotes.author: Shawn

quotes.quote: You saw us all on Earth: a selfish ass, an idiot DJ, a tortured academic, a hot, rich fraud with legs for days…side note, I might legit be into Tahani.
quotes.author: Eleanor

quotes.quote: I'm too young to die and too old to eat off the kids' menu. What a stupid age I am.
quotes.author: Jason

quotes.quote: Jason figured it out? Jason? This is a real low point. Yeah, this one hurts.
quotes.author: Michael

quotes.quote: They keep their Janets in a neutral pocket dimension beneath the shapeless time void. It's right next to Accounting.
quotes.author: Michael

quotes.quote: Actually, it is kind of clever how they punish philosophers. Every day, they make them go to school naked, and then they take a test in a class they've never been to. And then they smash them with hammers. And that part is not so clever.
quotes.author: Michael

quotes.quote: No one can ever truly turn over a new leaf. Sure, Ben Affleck told me he'd matured as an artist after he directed Argo, but then, right on schedule, it was, "Guess what, Tahani, I'm gonna be Batman".
quotes.author: Tahani

quotes.quote: They're gonna hang my picture in the Bad Place Hall of Fame right next to the guy who invented bees with teeth.
quotes.author: Michael
